article_text:
Veterans Affairs Secretary Robert McDonald is getting a ride through the media flames this week for suggesting that waits for treatment at VA hospitals are similar to standing in a long line at Disney World.

“When you go to Disney,” Mr. McDonald said, “do they measure the number of hours you wait in line? What’s important is, what’s your...

twitter.description: Wonder Land Columnist Daniel Henninger writes that the VA’s health-care wait lines are a metaphor for the entire U.S. government.
twitter.creator: @danhenninger
twitter.title: We’re All in Disney World
